title: Annapurna's World Vegetarian Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Organic, Take-out, Bakery, Ayurvedic
description: At this location in St. Michaels Village West Shopping Ctr since Jan 2011, Annapurna features Ayurvedic cuisine, chai tea, and in-house bakery. Menu items include breakfast meals, paneer, idli sambhar, kitchari, masala dosa, rice and dal, chai, lassi, vegan carrot cake, dail specials, and more. Vegan friendly with gluten free options.
